秤.definition: steelyard balance; Roman balance; CL:臺|台[tai2]

秤桿.definition: the beam of a steelyard; a balance arm

秤盤.definition: the tray or pan of a steelyard balance

秤砣雖小壓千斤.pinyin: chèng tuó suī xiǎo yā qiān jīn
秤砣雖小壓千斤.definition: although small, a steelyard weight may tip a hundred pounds (idiom); apparently insignificant details can have a large impact; for want of a nail the battle was lost
